titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Roy Franklin Proffitt papers

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

archdesc.bioghist: Professor of law at the University of Michigan.
archdesc.scopecontent: Minutes and working papers of the Michigan State Bar Special Committee for the Revision of the Criminal Code, 1965-1967; also speech, clippings, and related materials concerning his participation in the investiture of Edgardo J. Angara as president of the University of the Philippines; also biographical information and photographs relating to 100-year-old alumni of the University of Michigan law school.

corpname.subordinate_name: Special Committee of the Michigan State Bar for the Revision of the Criminal Code

c01.scopecontent: Minutes and working papers of the Michigan State Bar Special Committee for the Revision of the Criminal Code, 1965-1967; also speech, clippings, and related materials concerning his participation in the investiture of Edgardo J. Angara as president of the University of the Philippines; also biographical information and photographs relating to 100-year-old alumni of the University of Michigan law school.
Photographs of 100-year-old alumni of the University of Michigan Law School.
